readable.title: 267015208_d80b3eb94d
readable.content: A green Volkswagen Bug and other vintage cars are admired by people in a courtyard . A lime green VW bug . Cars and people gathered in a city mall area . In this plaza , we see a green VW beetle , a white sports coupe and many people looking at the autos . The courtyard of a South American city with a crowd and vintage cars .
